Text.Name: Gong_8_Jin
Text.Desc: One of the true elemental Laws of the Taiyi Sect. As the shape of the Grand Chariot can show people's death, contemplating over it will bring advance in this Law. It will grant the cultivator an unmatched power in battles.
Text.SelectDesc: One will excel in sword mastery, but it will take a long time to cultivate. Are you sure you want to follow this Law?
